scripts.clean:evidence: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force Evidence\video\* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force Evidence\screenshots\* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force Evidence\traces\* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force allure-results\* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force test-results\* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
